# Channel Point Rewards (Toggle) - by Njna_Grimsdottir

## Description
This one just uses the toggle feature to flip all listed rewards on/off simple and easy to just go through and add your CPR values to and then make a command pointing to it.

## Installation

Copy the text from the code box below into the `Import` box in Streamer.bot to add these to your action library:

```

```

## Configuration

Just change each of the `Subactions` to point to one of your channel point rewards.

![cpr-toggle.png](/examples/cpr-toggle.png)
